text: Okay, that sounds like it would be very interesting! Have you looked up internships which may give you a better insight into the line of work you could go into? Also would you be interested in the research side of things? Also do you have a LinkedIn account?

I haven’t had a chance, I didn’t get the right grades or decent GCSE grades for me to possibly get into an internship. I don’t really know how I would find one. Could you possibly help me with that haha? If not, that’s all good! How’re you tonight? Yeah, I’d love to be involved with research, it’d deepen my understanding in the science field and the procedures behind closed doors! I haven’t got a Linkedin account:confounded:
